verse.name: c1
verse.lines: He took my sins away, newline He took my sins away, newline And keeps me singing every day! newline I'm so glad He took my sins away. newline He took my sins away.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I came to Jesus, weary, worn and sad. newline He took my sins away; newline He took my sins away. newline And now His love has made newline My heart so glad. newline He took my sins away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The load of sin was more newline Than I could bear. newline He took them all away; newline He took them all away. newline And now on Him I roll newline My every care. newline He took my sins away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: No condemnation have I in my heart. newline He took my sins away; newline He took my sins away. newline His perfect peace He did to me impart. newline He took my sins away.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: If You will come to Jesus Christ today, newline He'll take Your sins away, newline He'll take Your sins away, newline And keep You happy in His love each day. newline He'll take Your sins away.
